name: Ice Tanks
description:
A game made for the Unreal Engine 2018 Winter Game Jam (February), the theme was "On Thin Ice".

Get enemy tanks into the water, while staying out of the water yourself.

WASD to move. Mouse to move targeting reticule. Left click to shoot fireball to destroy ice. Right click to shoot ice ball to rebuild ice sheet.

Post-Jam Update: Now with partial controller support (menus still need a mouse) and local multiplayer PVP or CO-OP up to 4 players.
